description:
Softick Solitaire is a classic Klondike solitaire game, especially optimized for HP TouchPad screen with a large and eye-friendly card set. Feel the difference! We really worked hard to give you hours of exciting game. Softick Solitaire is smart enough to catch the meaning of every gesture, helping you to focus on the game and not on the control. Our new Klondike Solitaire for your HP TouchPad has plenty of the nice features: 
*large and eye-friendly card set 
*fingers-adapted cards dragging 
*sound effects
*perfect graphics and animation 
*different types of scoring with additional Vegas game 
*extra large card set available 
You even have the right to make a mistake, just lift a finger and undo the last move. Now find a minute to forget your day-to-day worries and play classic Klondike solitaire card game!
versionNote:
- New cardset added
- Fixed some small bugs
